title: BTC Monk
author: BTC Monk
content: https://scarce.city/auctions/satoshi-throw-artwork-and-tokenVideo https://youtu.be/KyO7oflINFollow on https://twitter.com/BTCmonk1Satoshi Throw artwork is authentic and one of a kind handmade piece which was three month in a making. It took over 400 hundred hours to finish it. It was burned on plywood, gilded with over one hundred 22 carat gold leafs, coated in different types of lacquer and framed with authentic wooden frame.https://e3sik3ldpoyxcea74yyb6bhyajfctphsqtfgu5etjy7xz36u2s4a.arweave.net/JuSFbWN7sXEQH-YwHwT4AkopvPKEymp0k04_fO_U1Lg/4ks4pd_image.jpg

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Crazy piece of art, very unique.Just did a quick check of your twitter account, it appears you created some other great artworks using that gilding method - may I ask how / where you sold them?Good luck with the auction, will keep an eye on it.
